1.title: Boat People Invade Australia

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

1.plot: Radio host Zoe Hunter challenges the immigration minister live on air: "We must embrace refugees"... When the minister asks her whether she'd be happy to host 'boat people' into her own house, she blindly says "of course I would!" Next morning, following a flow of likes on her Facebook page, the doorbell rings - two refugees at her doorstep asking: "Which room is ours?"

2.title: How to Basics: Embracing Refugees

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

2.plot: Realizing she can milk it for media attention, Zoe welcomes a current affairs program into her home to experience her experience of Persian slash Arabic culture.

3.title: A Funny Package from Iraq

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

3.plot: A package arrives from Iraq, much to the excitement of Muncle and Sami. Muncle calls a house meeting, challenging Zoe to change her daily habits. Hazardous consequences ensue.

4.title: Interview with Al Gore

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

4.plot: Zoe lands the interview of her radio lifetime - Al Gore. But Sami's unexpected dream gets in the way.

5.title: Indian Festival: A Blonde's Guide

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

5.plot: Zoe takes Muncle and Sami on a road trip to mingle with their people, but little does she know Muncle has other plans for her beloved car Glennis.

6.title: Money Money Money!

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

6.plot: Muncle's mystery prayers have been answered, but in a different (blonde) pocket. What could he be hiding?

7.title: Job Hunting Tips for Refugees: A Blonde's Guide

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

7.plot: Refugees get jobs, even though their bridging E Visas won't allow it. Zoe gets peace in the house, but at what cost?

8.title: Dating Tips: Muslims Vs the Western World

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

8.plot: Muslim men meet Western women. It's Zoe's bid to get them out of her house, but it doesn't go quite as planned.

9.title: 2 Refugees Get Deported from Australia?

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

9.plot: Sami and Muncle face being deported back to Iraq. How can Zoe keep them in the country?

10.title: A Taste of Iraq

episode of.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde (TV Mini-Series 2015)

10.plot: Muncle and Sami kidnap Zoe to give her a taste of Iraq.

imdb.plot outline: Zoe Hunter, an idealistic radio host who thinks she's worldly challenges a prominent politician: why isn't Australia embracing refugees? When he turns the question back at her, Zoe proclaims she would gladly take refugees into her own home. Live on Air. Her listeners and media applaud her and the "Wake Up with Zoe" Facebook page goes wild with thousands of new likes. Just as she begins to bask in the limelight, the doorbell rings. Sami and Muncle, two Iraqi asylum seekers, arrive on her doorstep, suitcases in hand: "Which room is ours?!"
imdb.title: Two Refugees and a Blonde
plot: An outspoken blonde attempts to live with two erratic Muslim refugees.

Zoe Hunter, an idealistic radio host who thinks she's worldly challenges a prominent politician: why isn't Australia embracing refugees? When he turns the question back at her, Zoe proclaims she would gladly take refugees into her own home. Live on Air. Her listeners and media applaud her and the "Wake Up with Zoe" Facebook page goes wild with thousands of new likes. Just as she begins to bask in the limelight, the doorbell rings. Sami and Muncle, two Iraqi asylum seekers, arrive on her doorstep, suitcases in hand: "Which room is ours?!"
